alert.note: Alert for Northern Humboldt Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 29 at 8:17AM PST until December 01 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM WEDNESDAY TO 4 PM PST THURSDAY ABOVE 2000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 2000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Humboldt Interior and Southern Humboldt Interior Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM Wednesday to 4 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.

area.areaDesc: Northern Humboldt Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior
